words.definition: If someone is alone, they are not with another person.
words.example: The boy wanted to be alone to think.

words.definition: An apartment is a set of rooms in a building where people live.
words.example: She has a nice apartment in the city.

words.definition: An article is a story in a newspaper or magazine.
words.example: Did you read the article in the newspaper about the soccer game?

words.definition: An artist is a person who paints, draws, or makes sculptures.
words.example: He went to Paris to become an artist.

words.definition: Someone's attitude is the way they feel and think.
words.example: John has a bad attitude. He's always angry.

words.definition: To compare is to say how two things are the same and different.
words.example: If you compare the two cats, they look the same.

words.definition: To judge is to form an opinion about something.
words.example: The boy was judged by how well he played.

words.definition: A magazine is a regular book with many stories and pictures.
words.example: She reads magazines every morning.

words.definition: A material is what is used to make something.
words.example: The material used to make the shirt was very soft.

words.definition: A meal is a time when food is eaten.
words.example: Breakfast is my favorite meal.

words.definition: A method is the way to do something.
words.example: One method to stay healthy is to exercise.

words.definition: A neighbor is a person who lives near you.
words.example: I like my neighbor because he is very friendly.

words.definition: If something is professional, it is done well and for money.
words.example: The man's work was very professional.

words.definition: A profit is money you make from selling something.
words.example: I made a small profit from selling my car.

words.definition: The quality of something is how good it is.
words.example: The quality of his work was very high.

words.definition: A shape is a form of something.
words.example: The shape of the table was a circle.

words.definition: Space is an empty area.
words.example: I found a good space for my bike.

words.definition: Stairs are the things you use to go up and down in a building.
words.example: I walked up the stairs to get to the second floor.

words.definition: A symbol is an image that means something.
words.example: The dove is a symbol of peace.

words.definition: If someone is thin, they are not fat.
words.example: The boy was very thin because he didn't eat much.
